snippet: Mr. de Blasio has drawn criticism as Mr. Ickes, his longtime friend and mentor, has achieved lucrative results as a lobbyist for his firm’s clients in New York.
abstract: Records suggest close relationship between Harold M Ickes and New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio has provided lobbyist with extraordinary access to top officials and influence; de Blasio says friendship does not influence his decision-making or the city’s treatment of Ickes's clients, but relationship has come under criticism.
lead_paragraph: Mr. de Blasio has drawn criticism as Mr. Ickes, his longtime friend and mentor, has achieved lucrative results as a lobbyist for his firm’s clients in New York.

headline.main: Harold Ickes, Mentor to Mayor Bill de Blasio, Builds Lobbying Victories
headline.print_headline: Lobbyist With Friendly Ties to Mayor Reaps the Benefits
